✔Nationality: Dual Citizenship (Spanish and Brazilian) ✔Contact Details: ayres.fernando@gmail.com ✔Trilingual (Portuguese, Spanish and English) 

I am a trilingual (Portuguese, English, Spanish) Engineer with a BSc in Electrical and Electronics Engineering, MSc in Signal Processing and Electronics Instrumentation, MBA in Project Management and overall 13 years of experience in product development engineering in the areas of Medical, Software, Hardware and Military

Career Highlights 
- Over 13 years of experience in working on the organization's core products, holding an important role in leveraging the connection of Manufacturing to Design and Architecture, translating designs into products
- Supporting other engineers with all Product development phases required to bring product concepts into production as defined by clients and stakeholders
- Strong knowledge of electronic systems (hardware) project's development 
- Proven experience in programming microcontrollers (Assembly, Pascal, C, C++)
- Knowledge of VHDL programming for FPGAs Altera
- Strong experience in Labview applied to the development of test equipment
- Knowledge of Java programming and SQL

Specialties: Programming Assembly, C, C++ and Pascal; Labview programming; Development of electronic systems (hardware).
